channel.title: RSC Help!
channel.description:
I'm really new in this RSC thing and I have some questions:
1) What is RSC? 2) What's the difference between RSC and RS2? 3) Is coding RS2 similar or same as coding RSC? 4) In RSC you have a source and a client to run a server? 5) What's better , RSC or RS2 and why? 6) How do I start my own RSC server?
Thanks for the help :)

item.title: RSC Help!
item.dc:creator: @suprkwlguy123 suprkwlguy123
item.description:
@suprkwlguy123 wrote:

I’ll answer 3) right now because I feel like it. Both RS2 and RSC servers are made in java. That said, however, different files are used and different methods are used, so technically, to newfags like you, yes, the “coding” is different, even though they are both made in the same programming language…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 14, 2009, 07:56:41 pm[/size][hr]I’ll answer 3) right now because I feel like it. Both RS2 and RSC servers are made in java. That said, however, different files are used and different methods are used, so technically, to newfags like you, yes, the “coding” is different, even though they are both made in the same programming language…

Actually, I’ll answer number 5 too. RSC is better because it doesn’t have as many retards as RS2 asking “Y I CANT FIEND KLIENT.JERBAZ IT DOESNT EXIST ?? THERES ONYL CLIENT TEXT FILE ??? :mad: :mad: :rolleyes: :mad:”, and the pking is better because you can’t “run” like you can in rs2, and you have to wait 3 rounds of combat before fleeing.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 14, 2009, 07:57:14 pm[/size][hr]By run, I mean there is no running in game whatsoever.

Read full topic
